summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PayPal donation system integration - all functionality working perfectly
passed_tests: All 22 backend API endpoints including new donation endpoints (100% success rate)
PayPal donation endpoints: /api/donations/create-payment and /api/donations/stats working correctly
Donation page loads with PayPal integration UI
All predefined donation amounts ($10, $25, $50, $100, $250, $500) are clickable and functional
PayPal checkout button appears after selecting amount
Optional donor info fields (name, email, message) work correctly
PayPal proceed button enables/disables based on amount selection
Alternative donation methods section displays properly
Tax benefits section shows correct information
All previous functionality still works: navigation, contact form, news page
Donar Ahora button in navigation correctly navigates to donation page
All page sections have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design and proper styling maintained
